message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the possibility of selling you this incredible product. After careful consideration, I'm willing to offer it to you for $1200000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to you.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my budget constraints, I would like to propose a price of $1100000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. After re-evaluating the product's value, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm proposing a new price of $1150000. I believe this is a fair compromise considering the product's worth to you.

Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. Based on my budget, I would like to propose a price of $1125000 for the product. I hope this proposal helps us reach an agreement.

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm still not willing to go as low as $1125000. Considering the product's value to me, I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm proposing a new price of $1140000. I believe this is the best compromise we can reach.
Thank you for your latest offer, Alice. I've carefully considered your proposal and am willing to match it at $1140000. This price seems to be the most reasonable compromise given both our positions.
